https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lR2sMfCwcpNiH4fmTrOxHqp3d6C.jpg Longtime best friends Sid and Jonesie are dumped by their respective girlfriends. Both without a living situation, they decide to become "bromates", bros who are roommates, which puts their relationship to the ultimate test. Bromates
